mapper.select: SELECT CO_NUM, BO_NUM, PO_NUM, CO_CONTENT, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(co_date, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') THEN TO_CHAR(co_date,'HH:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(co_date, 'YY/MM/DD') END AS CO_DATE, MEM_ID FROM COMMENT_TBL WHERE PO_NUM = #{PO_NUM} AND CO_IS_USED = 1
mapper.delete: UPDATE COMMENT_TBL SET CO_IS_USED = 0 WHERE CO_NUM = #{CO_NUM}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT_TBL VALUES( COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 4, #{PO_NUM}, #{CO_CONTENT}, 1, SYSDATE, #{MEM_ID} )
